comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Evelyn Vandergrift (NYTimes has it with the extra r) was accused of cutting paperhanger Frederick Richardson in 1914, after a dispute over a ring. His thumb was cut in the struggle, and he ended up dying from blood poisoning. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9504E1DC1730E733A...
